description:
Make your shopping a little easier – download Rimi application.
Browse tasty recipes, use your phone for instore shopping, use discount coupons, create and share shopping lists, check your personal or markdown offers at particular store, as well as subscribe to the best weekly deals. You don’t even have to bring MyRimi loyalty card – just scan the QR code or choose store where to start shopping within the application!

Main functionality includes following:
* QR code scanning - Use your phone as My Rimi card at checkout or terminal
* Personal offers - Check and activate your personalized offers
* Offers - Browse through the best weekly or markdown deals
* Shopping list - Make a shopping list, share it with family or friends
* Coupons - Activate your coupons
* Recipes - Discover tasty recipes, add products to your shopping list
* Rewards - get rewarded when you fulfill the conditions
* Scan and shop - save your time: use your phone for instore shopping

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

LIDO ir viens no atpazīstamākajiem un iecienītākajiem restorānu tīkliem Latvijā. 

Uzņēmums dibināts 1987. gadā un kopš tā laika ir izveidojis vairākus restorānus un veikalus Rīgā un Rīgas rajonā. LIDO piedāvā ne tikai gardus ēdienus, bet arī izcilu atmosfēru. LIDO koncepta pamatā ir pašapkalpošanās, kas ļauj klientiem pašiem izvēlēties un kombinēt dažādus ēdienus pēc savām vēlmēm un piedāvā plašu ēdienu klāstu, sākot no klasiskām latviešu zupām un gaļas ēdieniem līdz svaigiem dārzeņiem un desertiem.
Pašlaik Latvijā LIDO ir 13 restorāni un 4 veikali.

Tagad visiem klientiem ir pieejama LIDO lojalitātes programmas lietotne, kurā ir iespēja reģistrēties un iegūt vairākas priekšrocības.

LIDO lojalitātes programmas priekšrocības:
• 5 % uzkrājums no pirkuma, ko iespējams atprečot nākamajā pirkuma reizē.
• Kafijas klubs, kur izmantojot LIDO lojalitātes programmas lietoni, katra 7. kafija par brīvu.
• Vakariņotāju klubs, kur iepērkoties 10 reizes par vismaz 7 EUR, laikā no 18.00-22.00, 11. reizi saņem atlaižu kuponu 7 EUR nākamajam vakariņu pirkuma reizei.
• Īpašie piedāvājumi lojalitātes programmas lietotnes lietotājiem.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

“HESBURGER COUPONS ON YOUR PHONE? DONE!”
The Hesburger app makes it easy to have a treat. Download Hesburger’s legendary discount coupons! The app also lets you order and pay for products with ease. You’ll have a Bonus Card on your phone, giving you access to all the excellent discounts of the Bonus Club. And just a couple of clicks will show you the nearest Hesburger restaurants. And their opening hours. And the latest campaigns. And… Well, download it and you’ll see.

HOW TO MAKE THE MOST OF THE APP:

1. Use the app to join or log in to our free Bonus Club. This will give you more coupons, let you collect and spend Bonus money and enjoy all our Bonus discounts.
2. Add your credit or debit card details to the app. This will let you order and pay for products on your phone and pick them up at a restaurant (“click and collect”).

Download it now.

Enjoy your Hesburger!

The Magic Stamp app is for people who love receiving rewards but don’t have room in their wallet for multiple stamp cards from all their favourite independent businesses.

The Magic Stamp app gives you access to digital stamp cards for your favourite independent businesses and keeps them all in one place, never to be lost again. 

HOW IT WORKS
We’ve created a unique stamp card experience with no QR codes, no IDs and no faff. Just get stamped and receive your rewards instantly.

Simply present your Magic Stamp Card in participating stores to receive a stamp from the vendor on your next purchase. 

You’ll be rewarded with free goodies as well as receiving exclusive gifts and discounts from your favourite independents.

More Magic Stamp Cards coming very soon...
A loyalty solution for coffee drinkers who value good deals and constantly surprising experiences.

Viss veikals tavā kabatā! Lejupielādē lietotni BARBORA un pasūti preces vēl vienkāršāk un ātrāk, lai kur arī neatrastos.

PIEGĀDE UZ MĀJĀM
Pasūtījumu saņemsi tieši mājās! Izvēlies sev ērtu piegādes laiku un gaidi BARBORA kurjeru!
Piegādājam Rīgā, Rīgas rajonā, Jūrmalā, Ogrē, Ķekavā, Olainē, Salaspilī, Jelgavā, Liepājā un citos reģionos.

PRIORITY PIEGĀDE
Cepsi picu, bet vairs nav miltu? Nepaliec bez vakariņām, izvēlies preču piegādi 2 stundu laikā! Pakalpojums pieejams daļā Rīgas. 


BARBORA lietotnes priekšrocības:

LABĀKIE ATLAIŽU PIEDĀVĀJUMI TAVĀ KABATĀ! 
Skati visas nedēļas akcijas. Piesaisti savu PALDIES lojalitātes karti un saņem vēl lielākas atlaides! Izvēlies saņemt paziņojumus no mums un nepalaidīsi garām jaunākās ziņas un piedāvājumus. 

LIETOTNE IR SAISTĪTA AR BARBORA MĀJAS LAPU
Sāki izvēlēties preces datorā, bet nepaspēji pabeigt pasūtījumu? Ērti turpini telefonā jau iesākto iepirkšanos!

IESPĒJA IZSEKOT PASŪTĪJUMA GAITAI
Seko savam pasūtījumam reāllaikā! Lietotnē varēsi redzēt, kur atrodas kurjers ar taviem pirkumiem. Un, ja piekrīti paziņojumu saņemšanai, par pasūtījuma statusu informēsim arī ar SMS.

ĒRTA PREČU MEKLĒŠANA
Vai meklē konkrētas preces? Ieraksti to nosaukumus meklēšanas lodziņā, un tavs iepirkumu grozs būs gatavs acumirklī!

GROZA PAPILDINĀŠANAS FUNKCIJA
Tikko veici pasūtījumu, bet aizmirsi dažas preces? Nekādu problēmu, jo vari papildināt pasūtījumu, līdz mēs sākam to sagatavot.

IECIENĪTO PREČU SAGATAVES
Izveido grozus ar precēm, kuras regulāri iegādājies, un nākamreiz visas nepieciešamās preces ievieto grozā ar vienu klikšķi.

ĒRTĀKIE MAKSĀJUMU VEIDI
Google Pay/Apple Pay jau BARBORĀ! Par precēm var norēķināties arī piegādes brīdī.

IR VIEGLI IEGĀDĀTIES RECEPTES SASTĀVDAĻAS
Izmēģini BARBORAS recepšu sadaļu. Tajā atradīsi ne tikai ļoti vienkāršas (un ārkārtīgi garšīgas) receptes, bet ar vienu klikšķi varēsi pasūtīt visas nepieciešamās sastāvdaļas!

IETAUPĪJUMI AR BARBORAS LOJALITĀTES PROGRAMMU
Izmantojot BARBORAS lojalitātes programmu, katrs pirkums dos iespēju ietaupīt vairāk.
Kad sasniegsi ikmēneša mērķi, saņemsi atlaidi nākamajam pirkumam. Ar BARBORA ietaupīsi bez jebkādiem trikiem!

Application for restaurant Much More Sun food delivery. Application works only for Latvian customers. 

Ar šo aplikāciju Jūs variet pasūtīt savus iemīļotākos ēdienus no Vēl Vairāk Saules. Apskatiet ēdienkarti, pievienojiet ēdienus grozā, aizpildiet pasūtījuma informāciju un spiediet "Gatavs" un mūsu operatori ar Jums sazināsies.

Welcome to Eatr - the ultimate companion for everyone from cooking novices to seasoned chefs! 
Our app is designed to guide you through a culinary adventure tailored just for you. Whether you're pressed for time or looking to indulge in a leisurely cooking spree, Eatr has you covered.

Time Management in Your Kitchen:
Choose your cooking time - from quick 15-minute bites to sumptuous meals under an hour - and let Eatr plan your menu. Busy schedules have met their match with our smart, time-conscious recipes.

Get Inspired:
Dive into thousands of mouth-watering recipes. With Eatr, discover daily inspiration and never run out of ideas for your next meal.

Personalized Skills Journey:
Whether you’re just starting out or are a kitchen pro, Eatr grows with you. Select your skill level and get recipes that challenge and excite you, all the while expanding your culinary prowess.

Dietary Preferences? We Listen:
Keto? Vegan? Pescatarian? No matter your diet, Eatr offers personalized recommendations to keep you aligned with your lifestyle choices. Sticking to your diet was never this effortless or delightful.

Powerful Filters for Tailored Search:
With robust search filters for cuisine, diet, meal type, and more, find exactly what you fancy with just a few taps.


Ratings and Feedback:
Be part of a community where your opinion matters. Rate recipes, helping others and yourself to the best-tasting dishes.

Nutritional Insight:
Stay informed with detailed nutritional information for each recipe, ensuring you meet your health and fitness goals.



Easy Cooking with Step-by-Step Guides:
Clear, concise, and easy-to-follow instructions take the guesswork out of cooking. Enjoy the process as much as the result!

Terms of use: https://eatr.com/terms_of_service

Visi TIAMO GRUPAS restorāni / kafejnīcas / picērijas / bāri / banketa servisi vienuviet!

TIAMO FOOD pieejams Liepājā, Jelgavā, Ogrē, Valmierā, Siguldā un Daugavpilī.
Čili Pizza / Olive / Sushi Boom / Čello / Lotte caffe / Teātra kafejnīca

Kāpēc TIAMO FOOD?
Pasūti ēdienu līdzņemšanai vai ar piegādi un seko līdzi progresam.
Rezervē galdiņu iemīļotajā restorānā pāris sekunžu laikā.
Pasūti visu svētku galdam nepieciešamo un iepriecini viesus ar lielisku svētku maltīti
Veic pasūtījumu uz konkrētu datumu/ laiku un aizmirsti raizes
Izvēlies ērtāko maksāšanas veidu – tiešsaistē vai pasūtījuma saņemšanas brīdī
Saņem īpašas TIAMO lojalitātes programmas atlaides
Vienmēr esi lietas kursā, kur tuvumā var garšīgi ieturēt maltīti

TIAMO FOOD – Vēl tuvāk!

TIAMO GRUPA ir viens no vadošajiem ēdināšanas uzņēmumiem Latvijā. Izcila apkalpošana, izmeklēts piedāvājums un rūpība ikvienā detaļā. Ar mīlestība pret savu darbu jau 15 gadus. 

----------------------------------

All TIAMO GROUP restaurants/cafeterias/pizzerias/bars/catering services in one place.

Available in Liepaja, Jelgava, Ogre, Valmiera, Sigulda, and Daugavpils.
Čili Pizza / Olive / Barons / Čello / Lotte caffe / Theater caffe

Why TIAMO FOOD?
Order takeaway or with delivery and keep track of it
Make a reservation in your favorite restaurant within a few seconds
Order everything to put on your celebration table and surprise your guests with wonderful meal
Make an order to certain date and time ahead and do not worry about it.
Choose the most convenient payment method – pay online or when receiving the order.
Get special TIAMO loyalty program discounts
Always be aware of the closest places to get delicious food

TIAMO FOOD – Even closer!

TIAMO GROUP is one of the largest groups of hospitality enterprises in Latvia. Outstanding service, impeccable offer and attention to every detail. With smile since 2003.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

developer: YOUSUF A. AL GHANIM & SONS CO. W.L.L
description:
Loyalty is worth rewarding

The Costa Coffee Club ME App is how we reward our customers for their loyalty.

Download the new Costa Coffee Club ME App now.

Kuwait: Every KD 1 you spend, you earn 10 beans.
100 beans will earn you KD 1 that you can spend on anything you love at any Costa Coffee store in Kuwait.

KSA: Every 10 SR you spend, you earn 10 beans.
100 beans will earn you 10 SR that you can spend on anything you love at any Costa Coffee store in KSA.

Qatar: Every 10 QR you spend, you earn 10 beans.
100 beans will earn you 10 QR that you can spend on anything you love at any Costa Coffee store in Qatar.

Here is how you get started:

1. Download the app and type in your phone number.

2. Start earning beans instantly with every purchase by tilting your phone to scan the QR code on the app.

3. Complete your profile and get 100 beans for free.

4. If you already collected beans, the menu section will show your bean total and how much it amounts to in your local currency.

5. You can start redeeming after signing up and making your first purchase through the app.

6. Enjoy the Costa Wiggle: Wiggle is an interactive feature that we bring to you inside the app. All you need to do is literally wiggle your phone to reveal offers that are exclusively available for people who have downloaded the Costa Coffee Club ME App. You can redeem one Wiggle offer once per week.

Costa Coffee Club ME App is only available for usage in Costa Coffee stores by Alghanim Industries in Kuwait, KSA & Qatar.

Unlock your home's full potential with HomeID.


HomeID, formerly NutriU, is your all-in-one app for meal planning and prep, with a variety of healthy and delicious recipes to explore. It's your companion for delicious Airfryer recipes and meals - from breakfast to dinner, healthy snacks, and delightful coffee breaks. Collaborating with home cooks, professional chefs, baristas, and Philips Kitchen Appliances, HomeID elevates daily routines into enjoyable experiences with:
• A vast array of easy recipes for every meal and occasion, including snacks, main courses, desserts, brunches, hot drinks, and more. Explore a world of homemade culinary delights.
• Detailed nutritional information for each recipe, empowering you to make informed choices for yourself and your loved ones.
• Diverse culinary options catering to all preferences, such as pasta, casseroles, chicken dishes, cheesecakes, and an extensive selection of vegan and vegetarian choices.
• Instructional videos, expert advice, and integrated features for Philips kitchen appliances, covering Airfryers, coffee/espresso machines, pasta makers, blenders, juicers, Air Steam Cookers, and All-in-One Cookers.
• Tips for crafting the perfect espresso or a simple caramel latte, bringing barista-level coffee into your home.
• A community dedicated to finding joy in the small things amid busy schedules.
• Plus, you can now purchase home appliances directly from your HomeID app.


HomeID - Your Comprehensive Home Appliance App.
Maximize your capabilities with HomeID. Suitable for new appliance owners and seasoned users, HomeID unveils the full potential of your home.
Embrace simplicity in your daily life. Join us at HomeID.

Skip the line with COFYZ app. 

COFYZ provides a modern way of ordering food and drinks - order ahead online, pick-up at the cafe without wasting time in a queue. Also, COFYZ gives you nice opportunities, such as:

- Invite your friends to COFYZ and get free drinks!

- Buy a voucher for your favorite drinks and get a 20% discount.

- Share your drinks with your friends - it's so easy with the COFYZ app.

And of cause really nice specialty coffee.

Hungry? Get your favourite meals, takeaways and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVOURITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favourites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or Fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighbourhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.

The official McDonald’s iPhone app!

Coupons, restaurants and your favorite products in a new design. Download our new app today:

- Current promotional products* and all our classics
- Coupons* for direct redemption at the restaurant, simply scan them at the counter
- Product finder with nutritional info
- Restaurant finder with opening hours, services and directions
- Mobile Order & Pay**


* Only at participating restaurants in Germany and Luxembourg.
** Mobile ordering and payment is currently only available in some restaurants. A list of participating restaurants can be found in the app. Mobile payment requires a valid VISA or Master Card credit card. The order function is only active if you are near a participating restaurant.

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

Have an idea to make your cooking experience with ReciMe better? Please email us at hello@recime.app so we can help!

Tired of cooking the same 3 meals on repeat? Zest integrates a mind-blowing cooking education into your routine. Learn to cook with us through step-by-step explanations of foundational cooking concepts in fewer than 10 minutes and dishes that bring the concept to life. Our recipes are created by two former Michelin star chefs, distilled by a home chef, and cooked by you, the superstar home cook that you are (or will be). We don't assume any prior culinary knowledge. We meet you where you are and help you improve.
 
Stop copying traditional recipes - start learning from Zest. We've cooked those delicious Bon Appetit dinners. But when we took away the recipes we felt like lost puppies. Zest is designed to teach you the how's and why's of cooking. So when the recipe is gone you can confidently navigate the kitchen. The promise: Taste improvement after one dinner with Zest.

FEATURES:

STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS
We've all tried cooking a TikTok recipe. You rewatch the video 13 times to figure out what the hell is going on. Zest embeds videos throughout recipes so you can click into content when you need it. No more pausing and restarting. Learn at your own pace.
 
CONCEPT VIDEOS
Watch a short video on a new concept at your own pace and then cook recipes that reinforce what you've learned. We dive into topics like the science of tasting and the basics of seasoning, sautéing, roasting and more!

SKILL VIDEOS
Don't know how to dice an onion? Don't be embarrassed, we got you covered. Skill videos are linked in each recipe to guide you along, so you don't have to watch Gordon Ramsey on YouTube (we love his accent too).

CURATED MENU
Choose a menu to fit your preferences. Tired of wasting produce? Search for dishes including what’s already in your fridge. Got allergies? Compile safe recipes in your menu to find them when you’re ready to get cooking. 

GROCERY LIST
Shop your menu with our automated grocery list. Plus, utilize our helpful tips while you shop. Don't know what a neutral oil is? We got you covered.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
Rate the recipes you cook, so we can recommend similar ones.

Feedback? Technical Issues? Killer ideas you want to contribute to make our app better? Email us at support@zestapp.co. We're always here to help and would love to chef up new ideas together!

We know where you can find the flavours that fit you.  If there's one thing we know it’s food delivery. It’s our mission to bring tasty food from your favourite local restaurant right to your door so you can eat good food everyday. We'll go the extra mile to make your order the greatest food experience in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or the freshest sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodora is the best food delivery and take away service in your city -- so let's take the first bite!

Check if we're in your city by downloading the app.

SO WHAT’S THE DEAL?

You’re ready and waiting to eat, we’ve all been there, dreaming of thai food, eating burgers in our dreams. Here’s what we do: first choose between delivery and Pick-Up to fit food ordering seamlessly into your schedule. Pick-Up is simple -- you make your order and then collect your food from the restaurant once it’s ready. No more queuing, ever (our app is magic). If you choose delivery, our couriers will bring the food you've been lusting after right to your door. Dreams really do come true.

HOW IT WORKS

First, enter your address (home/ office/ treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant and place an order. They’ll prepare your food and once it’s ready, our courier bring it to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Then you eat. Food goals.

WHAT MAKES US SPECIAL

foodora chooses your local favourites; the best food near you. Vietnamese or Italian, healthy salads or food to nurse your hangover -- your dinner will be cooked with love and care. Our riders come to your very doorstep with a smile while you save time to do something else you love. There's a cuisine and a dish to suit every moment, and we'll help you make the first bite last.

ANYTHING ELSE?

Of course your safety is important to us. We guarantee secure, simple mobile payment, so you can eat when you're hungry and pay however you like.

TALK TO US

If you’ve ordered with us before, we’d want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/ teenage confessionals. Let us be your notepad.
Email us at support@foodora.se

For further info, visit
www.foodora.com/

Töltsd le most és regisztrálj a megújult BK® applikáción és élvezd az előnyöket!

1. Rendelj 4 egyszerű lépésben és felejtsd el a sorban állást:

a. Állítsd össze a rendelésed,

b. Válaszd az online fizetést (Bankkártya, Apple vagy Google Pay, SZÉP-kártya) vagy válaszd a kasszánál fizetek opciót

c. Menj az étterem 100 m-es körzetébe és add le a rendelésed

d. Ha jelezzük az appon vagy a monitoron, hogy kész a rendelés, akkor vedd át az erre kijelölt területen

2. Érd el a legexkluzívabb BURGER KING® kuponokat csak a BK® appon

3. Csatlakozz az új MyBurgerKing törzsvásárlói programhoz, húzd be az ingyenes ajándékokat és élvezd a BK® Bónusz előnyöket!

4. Szeretnél extra bacont vagy sajtot, netalántán jalapenot a szendvicsedbe? Randiznál és elhagynád a hagymát? Ezeket is simán megteheted a megújult appban!

5. Mondd el a véleményed! Minden appos rendelés után lehetőséged lesz értékelni az élményed, amit extra koronával jutalmazunk! A jónak nagyon örülünk, a hibáinkból pedig nagyon sokat tanulunk

6. Rendeld újra kedvenceidet 1 kattintással

….és ez nem minden! Folyamatosan fejlesztjük, javítjuk az appot a ti visszajelzéseitek alapján, így érdemes mindig frissíteni a BK® Appot.

A fentebb felsorolt funkciók eléréséhez regisztráció szükséges, amelyre e-mail cím megadásával van lehetőség. Az alkalmazásban található funkciók működéséhez és frissítéséhez internetkapcsolat szükséges. A BURGER KING® applikációt kizárólag 16 éven felüliek tölthetik le, illetve használhatják.

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797
